name: Tier 4 Melee Fumbles (Levels 13-20)
description: Fumble effects for melee attacks at Tier 4 (Levels 13-20). Even legends can fail catastrophically.

results.text: Nothing Special - You stumble but recover with no additional penalty.
Catastrophic Fall - You fall prone, are stunned until end of your next turn, and attacks against you have advantage.
Severe Self-Injury - You critically wound yourself. Take 3d6 damage and have disadvantage on all attacks for 1 minute.
Weapon Badly Damaged - Your weapon is badly damaged. -2 to attack and damage rolls until repaired by a skilled smith.
Hit Yourself Critically - Your weapon rebounds and strikes you critically. Take triple your weapon damage.
Incapacitating Failure - Your catastrophic failure stuns you. You are incapacitated for 1 round and prone.
Fatigued - The fumble utterly exhausts you. You have disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks for 1 minute.
Disarmed - Your weapon flies from your grasp, landing 25 feet away.
Devastate Allies - Your wild swing strikes all allies within 10 feet. Roll attack against each; hit deals weapon damage.
